name: Twenty Kanny Weapons
description:
Suddenly with 20 weapons, our crab-type warriors aim for the wilderness.
Use 20 weapons by combining 4 buttons on the gamepad and standing / squatting / jumping warriors!
In addition, special equipment is also available in the four directions of the cross pad!

In addition, when approaching an enemy, a melee attack is automatically performed.

* projectFile uploaded *

- You can walk, crouch and jump by operating the left stick.

- Perform various attacks with four buttons.For example, XBOX GAM PAD corresponds to A / B / X / Y.

- For weapon typesLook at the attack method icons corresponding to the buttons at the bottom of the screen.

- Touch [G] on the right edge of the stage to clear the stage.
